nodes.text: Visitractic 830 factory surveillance cams were high-quality surveillance cameras used to guard factories during the Age of the Empire. They were fat disks that were attached to ceilings. They were used to make sure that products kept moving. Several were stationed aboard the Calcoraan Depot and on the planet Gorse.

Due to her slicing skills, the surveillance operator Zaluna Myder was able to freeze several of the cameras so that her companions Kanan Jarrus, Hera Syndulla, and Skelly could infiltrate Count Denetrius Vidian's personal quarters aboard the Calcoraan Depot.
